actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 to require the Secretary of Transportation to develop and carry out a program to improve energy efficiency in transportation.
short_title: Better Utilizing Innovative Low-emission Development Strategies Act
subjects: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

summary.text:
Better Utilizing Innovative Low-emission Development Strategies Act or the BUILDS Act

This bill directs the Department of Transportation to establish a grant program to promote reductions in transportation energy use, accelerate the adoption of new and existing energy efficient technologies for transportation applications, and enhance transportation infrastructure.
